channel.title: Site for Michael S. Huang - rust
channel.description: A few interesting things about me

item.title: What contributing to QSV taught me
item.author: Unknown
item.description: I kinda had to learn Rust, because I sucked at C/C++ so badly. Once beyond the fun phase of copy-and-paste Adruino programming, my fascination with microcontrollers inevitably threw me back into the C/C++ nightmare of my college years. I could do Java/Scala/Python, but still clueless about how to properly manipulate strings in C/C++. So Rust was kinda my lifeboat.
